DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : PHASE I : determine recommend phase 2 dose nab-paclitaxel combination cisplatin , capecitabine , gemcitabine . PHASE II : evaluate feasibility activity PAXG regimen term 6-months progression-free survival patient stage III IV pancreatic cancer . OUTLINE Phase I - dose find single institution trial , follow randomize open label multicenter phase II trial . Phase II : Patients stratify stage ( III v IV ) CA19.9 level ( < 10 x ULN versus > 10 x ULN ) ; Patients randomly assign receive PAXG ( arm A ) gemcitabine-nab-paclitaxel regimen ( arm B ) . Treatment plan ( phase II ) : Arm A : PAXG every 4 week ( 1 cycle ) : cisplatin 30 mg/m2 day 1 15 , nab-paclitaxel RP2D day 1 15 , capecitabine 1250 mg/ m2 day 1-28 , gemcitabine 800 mg/ m2 day 1 15 . Arm B : Gemcitabine + nab-paclitaxel every 4 week ( 1 cycle ) : gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 day 1 , 8 15 ; nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/mq day 1 , 8 15 . Treatment administer maximum 6 cycle clinical benefit .
